articles.title: Asteroid hits Earth in "magnificent" spectacle over Europe - CBS News
articles.description: The 1-meter asteroid was discovered just hours before it hit Earth's atmosphere and almost 10 years to the day that an asteroid about 20 times bigger hit Chelyabinsk, Russia.

articles.title: Zelensky thanks Marcos for supporting Ukraine - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Monday expressed gratitude to President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. for backing the Eastern European nation in a 'first phone call in the history of bilateral relations' with the Philippines.
